com.soctec.soctec.core

Class AchievementsFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soctec.soctec.core.AchievementsFragment

  • public class AchievementsFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to order and display any number of Achievements in two ListViews, one for locked Achievements, and one for completed Achievements.
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Jesper Kjellqvist, Carl-Henrik Hult

        public void refreshAchievements(java.util.ArrayList<Achievement> locked,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Achievement> unlocked)
        Refreshes the locked and unlocked achievements in the list view.
        Parameters:
        locked - The locked achievements will be stored in this Arraylist.
        unlocked - The unlocked achievements will be stored in this Arraylist.

      • setPoints

        Displays the total of points the user have gathered.
